page.title: 17Religion-Nonconformists.
page.content:
Here is a list of the nonconformist chapels and churches, with their denominations, membership and approx. attendance at Sunday service and at Sunday School in that order.
Bethesda) Welsh 406 150 61 Bethania) Cong. 278 80 75 Bethel Baptist. 167 40 21 Ebenezer Methodist. 40 25 _ Carmel Apostolic 50 45 60 Elim Pentecostal. 26 30 40 Bryn Seion Cong. Evangelist. 24 21 _ Llain y Delyn Unitarian. 30 15 _
All the chapels hold morning and evening services, except for Llain y Delyn they have an afternoon service only. There is no Sunday School held at Ebenezer, Bryn Seion and Llain y Delyn.
